I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world.
i am the oldest sibling.
My family is my favorite people on Earth, but I don't like when they mess up my organizing schemes.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Good! I'm ready for the weekend.
Me too! I'm going to be spending time with my family.
That sounds fun! Do you have any siblings?
I have a brother and a sister. We're all pretty close.
That's great! I grew up with my parents and siblings too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and play video games.
I love to read too! What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book about the history of the Roman Empire.
That sounds really interesting! I'm not sure if I've read anything about the Roman Empire before.
It's really fascinating! I'm learning a lot about the culture and politics of the time.
I'm glad you're enjoying it! I'm sure I'll check it out sometime.
